Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: SB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th & Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th, then resume their normal route on Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 95th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: SB 115 Pullman/115th buses are temp. rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th & Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 93rd, Woodlawn, 95th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 95th/Cottage Grove.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
